document.full_text: the court of arbitration for sport postponed its hearing in alberto contador's doping case on thursday, meaning the cyclist could compete in the tour de france before the court issues a ruling.
document.title: cas postpones appeals hearing in contador case
lines_and_colors: the court of arbitration for sport postponed its hearing in alberto contador's doping case on thursday, meaning the cyclist could compete in the tour de france before the court issues a ruling.
